title: Another ranked match, Another player intentionally feeding - im sure he'll get banned
body:
Not gonna keep this thread long, im getting pretty sick of reporting these players who intentionally feed and watch as they keep playing.
Im not talking about "wow that player is so bad he is inting", im talking about the player literally saying he has to feed all lanes equally and when asked if he is inting he replied with : "Yea :D".

So this time i also sent a support ticket, and created this thread to update it later to see if anything was done, if Riot has no tolerence policy for someone using swear words in chat, i think intentional feeding should be at the same level, im sure Riot support will clean this up.

/endrant

replies.body:
More succinctly: "It seems people are getting away with undeniable intentional feeding."

To which not much can be said. It's true. There are excuses. It is a recurring problem that many, probably all, regular players suffer. It's not a very frequent occurrence, but enough to be disruptive- that is, at least 1 in 20 games, it happens.

Edit: i mean if it might be that frequent, it is a significant problem.

I am inclined to say that being positive can help prevent it, but this is more severe behavior that cannot be justified and should be punished.
I dunno man,  sometimes I say yes to everything to dismiss the toxics. Doesn't mean i'm inting.
Do you also go into lanes to feed them in turns while announcing you're doing so? i hope not.

Yes, I normally do put up the "yes" wall when I am feeding. 

Especially when I'm playing a squishy immobile champ while my team has no vision in our jungle and I'm just trying to collect minions in whatever lane to get back in the game, but the enemy has these champs that can instakill me and they dive me under my tower.

Doesn't mean I'm inting.

If you are going into other's lanes with the goal of feeding them kills - you are inting.
If you intentionaly die, youare inting.

Simple as that.

Goal was to collect CS. Feeding was a consequence of that goal.

Doesn't mean I'm inting.

Riot doesn't have a no tolerance policy for swear words/cussing. They have one for Hate Speech, Racism, and Encouraging self harm. Side note though, game play punishments are given a 14 day ban once confirmed.

> They have one for Hate Speech, Racism, and Encouraging self harm.

Not arguing against it, just saying the same should be done for intentional feeders, and like i said, i'll try to keep track on my latest report.
